Installation
=================

We provide MATLAB and Python implementations for ESSE.

MATLAB
-----------------
Download the matlab_esse folder from `ESSE GitHUB repository <https://github.com/yuanzhel94/ESSE>`_ and add to path.

.. code-block:: MATLAB

    addpath(genpath('matlab_esse'))

Python
-----------------
Implementation is available from PyPI distribution, and you may also clone and install manually from the `ESSE GitHUB repository <https://github.com/yuanzhel94/ESSE>`_ . 

.. note::

    The package is distributed on PyPI under the name :code:`pyesse`,
    but is imported in Python as :code:`esse` after installation.

PyPI Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
.. code-block:: bash

    pip install pyesse

Import in python
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
.. code-block:: python

    import esse
